error.message: Declaration of Drupal\entity_autocomplete_suggestions\EntityAutocompleteSuggestionsMatcher::getMatches($target_type, $selection_handler, array $selection_settings, $string = '') should be compatible with Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityAutocompleteMatcher::getMatches($target_type, $selection_handler, $selection_settings, $string = '')
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to entity_autocomplete_suggestions.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
